name: list_categories
description: List available Kali tool categories derived from the dataset.

name: list_tools
description: List the tools that belong to a specific category.

name: describe_tool
description: Summarise a Kali tool and surface package/binary details.

name: tool_details
description: Return rich metadata for a Kali tool including package and binary path.

name: search_tools
description: Perform fuzzy search against the dataset by package, category, or summary.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return (default 5).

name: suggest_tools
description: Suggest Kali tooling for a free-form task description using fuzzy matching.

arguments.name: task
arguments.desc: Plain-language task description to search against the catalog.

name: latest_cves
description: Fetch recent CVE summaries from the NVD API matching a keyword.

name: run_kali_tool
description: Execute a dataset-backed Kali binary inside the container and return stdout/stderr.

arguments.name: tool_name
arguments.desc: Tool to execute (must exist in the dataset, e.g., nmap).

arguments.name: arguments
arguments.desc: Optional command-line arguments passed verbatim to the tool.

arguments.name: timeout
arguments.desc: Override execution timeout in seconds (default comes from policy).

name: run_kali_tool_stream
description: Stream stdout/stderr from a dataset-backed Kali binary in real time.

arguments.name: tool_name
arguments.desc: Tool to execute (must exist in the dataset, e.g., nmap).

arguments.name: arguments
arguments.desc: Optional command-line arguments passed verbatim to the tool.

arguments.name: timeout
arguments.desc: Override execution timeout in seconds (default comes from policy).

name: export_run_history
description: Fetch recent tool execution metadata for auditing purposes.
